Written by Lisa Brennan · Published Dec 17, 2016

The 2016 series of Strictly Come Dancing draws to a close this weekend. If it's put you in the mood to dance, why not use your library card to access some of the great music we have available online?

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
